description: This file defines a NotificationsService class responsible for fetching user notifications via an API client, handling responses and errors.

classes.name: NotificationsService
classes.description: A service class for managing user notifications, including fetching notifications from an API.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetches a list of notifications for the user by making an HTTP GET request.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles errors encountered during HTTP requests, extracting meaningful error messages.
